remarks: Lemma for ~ mideu .  We can assume mideulem.9 "without loss of generality" (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Nov-2019.)
statement:
colperpex.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.

colperpex.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.

mideu.s $e |- S = ( pInvG ` G ) $.
mideu.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
mideu.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. P ) $.

mideulem.2 $e |- ( ph -> Q e. P ) $.
mideulem.3 $e |- ( ph -> O e. P ) $.
mideulem.4 $e |- ( ph -> T e. P ) $.
mideulem.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( A L B ) ( perpG ` G ) ( Q L B ) ) $.
mideulem.6 $e |- ( ph -> ( A L B ) ( perpG ` G ) ( A L O ) ) $.
mideulem.7 $e |- ( ph -> T e. ( A L B ) ) $.
mideulem.8 $e |- ( ph -> T e. ( Q I O ) ) $.
mideulem.9 $e |- ( ph -> ( A .- O ) ( leG ` G ) ( B .- Q ) ) $.
mideulem $p |- ( ph -> E. x e. P B = ( ( S ` x ) ` A ) ) $.
